definition: (usually plural) a destructive action, cause extensive destruction or ruin utterly
details:
noun
- (usually plural) a destructive action
= example: (usually plural) a destructive action
= synonyms: depredation
verb
- cause extensive destruction or ruin utterly
= synonyms: desolate
- make a pillaging or destructive raid on (a place), as in wartimes
= synonyms: harry
